21 #include <Arduino.h>

23 
24 class DXLPortHandler
25 {
26  public:
27  DXLPortHandler();
28 
29  virtual void begin() = 0;
30  virtual void end() = 0;
31  virtual int available(void) = 0;
32  virtual int read() = 0;
33  virtual size_t write(uint8_t) = 0;
34  virtual size_t write(uint8_t *buf, size_t len) = 0;
35  bool getOpenState();
36  void setOpenState(bool);
37 
38  private:
39  bool open_state_;
40 };

44 
45 class SerialPortHandler : public DXLPortHandler
46 {
47  public:
48  SerialPortHandler(HardwareSerial& port, const int dir_pin = -1);
49 
50  virtual void begin() override;
51  virtual void end() override;
52  virtual int available(void) override;
53  virtual int read() override;
54  virtual size_t write(uint8_t) override;
55  virtual size_t write(uint8_t *buf, size_t len) override;
56 
57  virtual void begin(unsigned long baud);
58  virtual unsigned long getBaud() const;
59 
60  private:
61  HardwareSerial& port_;
62  const int dir_pin_;
63  unsigned long baud_;
64 };

66 
67 #if defined(__OPENCR__)
68  #define USB_SERIAL_CLASS USBSerial
69 #elif defined(__MK20DX128__) || defined(__MK20DX256__)
70  #include <usb_serial.h> // Teensy 3.0 and 3.1
71  #define USB_SERIAL_CLASS usb_serial_class
72 #elif defined(_SAM3XA_)
73  #include <UARTClass.h> // Arduino Due
74  #define USB_SERIAL_CLASS UARTClass
75 #elif defined(ARDUINO_AVR_LEONARDO)
76  // Arduino Leonardo USB Serial Port
77  #define USB_SERIAL_CLASS Serial_
78 #elif defined(ARDUINO_CommXEL)
79  #include "USBSerial.h"
80  #define USB_SERIAL_CLASS USBSerial
81 #else
82  #define USB_SERIAL_CLASS HardwareSerial
83 #endif
84 
85 class USBSerialPortHandler : public DXLPortHandler
86 {
87  public:
88  USBSerialPortHandler(USB_SERIAL_CLASS& port);
89 
90  virtual void begin() override;
91  virtual void end() override;
92  virtual int available(void) override;
93  virtual int read() override;
94  virtual size_t write(uint8_t) override;
95  virtual size_t write(uint8_t *buf, size_t len) override;
96 
97  private:
98  USB_SERIAL_CLASS& port_;
99 };
